DisplayForm.Script:
<UiScreen infoLevel="Normal"> <Title>title</Title> <AutoTransition>100</AutoTransition> <Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="../start.xml"> <Label imgsrc="/submit.jpg">Submit</Label> </Op> <Op type="SkipGo" action="../start.xml"> <Label imgsrc="/star.jpg">Skipgo</Label> </Op> <Op type="Back" action="../start.xml"> <Label imgsrc="back.jpg">Back</Label> </Op> <Op type="Skip" action="../start.xml"> <Label imgsrc="/star.jpg">Skip</Label> </Op> </Operations> <IoScreen> <IoObject> <Title>IoObject Title 93</Title> <Description>IoObject Description 93</Description> <TextArea id="textarea_id93"> <InitValue>INITIAL</InitValue> <Mask>true</Mask> <LetterTypes> <LetterType>UpperCase</LetterType> <LetterType>Numeric</LetterType> </LetterTypes> </TextArea> </IoObject>
<IoObject> <Title>IoObject (DevParamArea)</Title> <Description>IoObject containing DevParamArea</Description> <DevParamArea id="devparamtarea_id85" cpos="Tail"> <!-- brpsPOP3Name --> <ParamOid>1.3.6.1.4.1.2435.2.4.3.1240.5.6.5.0</ParamOid>
<!-- fake --> <!-- <ParamOid>1.3.6.1.4.1.2435.2.4.3.1240.5.6.5.100</ParamOid> --> <!--brpsPOP3PasswordSet (ReadOnly) --> <!-- <ParamOid>1.3.6.1.4.1.2435.2.4.3.1240.5.6.9.0</ParamOid> -->
<MinLength>1</MinLength> <MaxLength>85</MaxLength> <Mask>false</Mask> <LetterTypes> <LetterType>UpperCase</LetterType> <LetterType>LowerCase</LetterType> <LetterType>Numeric</LetterType> <LetterType>Glyph</LetterType> </LetterTypes> </DevParamArea> </IoObject> </IoScreen> </UiScreen>
